title: The problem about EmbeddingBag module
body_html:
Code as below:

import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable

embedding_sum = nn.EmbeddingBag(10, 3, mode='sum')
x = Variable(torch.LongTensor([[1,2,4,5],[4,3,2,9]]))
embedding_sum(x)

raised an RuntimeError: expected a Variable argument, but got torch.LongTensor。
Pytorch Version: 0.2.0.post1
body_text:
Code as below:
import torch

embedding_sum = nn.EmbeddingBag(10, 3, mode='sum')

embedding_sum(x)
raised an   RuntimeError: expected a Variable argument, but got torch.LongTensor。
Pytorch  Version: 0.2.0.post1
body:
Code as below:

import torch
import torch.nn as nn
from torch.autograd import Variable

embedding_sum = nn.EmbeddingBag(10, 3, mode='sum')
x = Variable(torch.LongTensor([[1,2,4,5],[4,3,2,9]]))
embedding_sum(x)

raised an   RuntimeError: expected a Variable argument, but got torch.LongTensor。
Pytorch  Version: 0.2.0.post1
